thread.section_title: Bento&co評価／レビュー | お客様は Bento&coの評価／レビューをしました。 | bentoandco.com
thread.title: Alexander
thread.title_full: Bento&co について 投稿者 Alexander

author: Alexander
title: Alexander
text: After searching around on etsy and amazon for a bit, it was hard to find any boxes that actually fit price to material and quality. I dug a bit deeper on the google search and found Bento&Co! Their products seem to cover all corners. That is if you're searching for a sexy wooden box to make your friends jealous, or just a nice and simple box for your work adventures. Would recommend to anyone who is enthusiastic about Japanese culture and cuisine.
